what: R Client for the ProdPad API
title: R Client for the ProdPad API
text: prodpad packages exposes higher level APIs extract tibbles ProdPad information (example, products, feedback, ideas, etc.) ProdPad API. addition, prodpad provides low level wrapper around ProdPad API - pp() function.

title: Query the Prodpad API — pp
text: extremely minimal client. need know API able use client. function : Try substitute listed parameter endpoint, using {parameter} notation. GET request (default), add listed parameters query parameters. GET request, send parameters request body, JSON. Convert response R list using jsonlite::fromJSON().

title: Query the Prodpad API — pp
code: pp(   endpoint,   ...,   per_page = NULL,   .destfile = NULL,   .overwrite = FALSE,   .api_url = NULL,   .method = "GET",   .limit = NULL,   .accept = "application/json",   .send_headers = NULL,   .progress = TRUE,   .params = list(),   .unnest = !is.null(.unnest_element),   .unnest_element = NULL,   .unnest_dont_unlist = NULL )

title: Query the Prodpad API — pp
text: endpoint Prodpad API endpoint. Must one following forms: METHOD path, e.g. GET /rate_limit, path, e.g. /rate_limit, METHOD url, e.g. GET https://api.github.com/rate_limit, url, e.g. https://api.github.com/rate_limit. method supplied, use .method, defaults "GET". ... Name-value pairs giving API parameters. matched endpoint placeholders, sent query parameters GET requests, JSON body POST requests. one unnamed parameter, raw vector, JSON encoded, sent raw data, . can used example add assets releases. Named NULL values silently dropped. GET requests, named NA values trigger error. methods, named NA values included body request, JSON null. per_page Number items return per page. omitted, substituted max(.limit, 100) .limit set, otherwise determined API (never greater 100). .destfile Path write response disk. NULL (default), response processed returned object. path given, response written disk form sent. .overwrite .destfile provided, whether overwrite existing file.  Defaults FALSE. .api_url Github API url (default: https://api.github.com). Used endpoint just contains path. Defaults GITHUB_API_URL environment variable set. .method HTTP method use explicitly supplied endpoint. .limit Number records return. can used instead manual pagination. default NULL, means defaults GitHub API used. can set number request (less) records, also Inf request records. Note, request many records, multiple GitHub API calls used get , can take potentially long time. .accept value Accept HTTP header. Defaults "application/vnd.github.v3+json" . Accept given .send_headers, used. parameter can used provide custom media type, order access preview feature API. .send_headers Named character vector header field values (except Authorization, handled via .token). can used override augment default User-Agent header: "https://github.com/r-lib/gh". .progress Whether show progress indicator calls need one HTTP request. .params Additional list parameters append .... easier use ... parameters list already. .unnest TRUE, unnests result object .unnest_element Name element extract unnesting result object .unnest_dont_unlist Vector columns name ignore unnesting.

title: Query the Prodpad API — pp
text: Answer API pp_response object, also list. Failed requests generate R error. Requests generate raw response return raw vector.

what: Get a tibble of companies. — pp_get_companies
title: Get a tibble of companies. — pp_get_companies
text: Return list companies. Companies collection contacts providing feedback. Using companies allows group feedback organisational source.

title: Get a tibble of companies. — pp_get_companies
code: pp_get_companies(   name = NULL,   country = NULL,   company_size = NULL,   value = NULL,   city = NULL,   tags = NULL,   external_id = NULL,   external_url = NULL,   contacts = TRUE,   feedbacks = NULL,   page = NULL,   ... )

title: Get a tibble of companies. — pp_get_companies
text: name Filter companies name partial name companies. country Set filter companies based country. Use ISO Alpha-2 country codes. one country can filtered time. company_size Set filter companies based size. value Set filter companies based value. city Set filter companies based city. tags Filter companies tags associated feedback. Mulitple tags can specified acts . Use tag ID UUID. external_id Filter companies ID 3rd party application associated companies Prodpad external_url Filter companies URL associated company. contacts Whether include contacts associated company results. Default true. feedbacks Whether include feedback contact associated company results. Default true. Note set true contacts returned whether contacts set true false. page page results return (size always 100). ... arguments passed pp()

title: Get a tibble of companies. — pp_get_companies
text: useful business busines,s companies can used create sort grouping contacts example conference cohort. Using parameters allows also select whether return feedback associated company via contacts connected company. available accounts Advanced+ subscription.

title: Get a tibble of companies. — pp_get_companies
text: GET /companies

title: Get a list of all the contacts in the account. — pp_get_contacts
text: name Name contact partial name contacts filter list email Filter contacts email. company UUID company filter contacts . persona ID persona filter contacts . job_role UUID job role filter contacts . tags ID, UUID name one tags filter contacts . external_id Filter contacts ID another application CRM external_url Filter contacts URL another application CRM feedbacks Wheter include feedback contact results. Default false. page Page number results return. size Number results per page. ... arguments passed pp()

title: Get a list of all the contacts in the account. — pp_get_contacts
text: GET /contacts

title: Get tibble of feedbacks. — pp_get_feedbacks
text: Returns tibble feedback can straight list grouped contact using group_by parameter.  list can also filtered state query parameter active, archived, unsorted .Note default active feedback returned.

title: Get tibble of feedbacks. — pp_get_feedbacks
code: pp_get_feedbacks(   state = c("active", "archived", "unsorted", "all"),   company = NULL,   company_country = NULL,   company_size = NULL,   company_value = NULL,   customer = NULL,   product = NULL,   persona = NULL,   job_role = NULL,   tags = NULL,   has_ideas = NULL,   external_id = NULL,   external_url = NULL,   group_by = FALSE,   page = 1,   size = 100,   ... )

title: Get tibble of feedbacks. — pp_get_feedbacks
text: state Set value active active, archived archived feedback, unsorted unsorted feedback feedback. Default active. company Set filter feedback results based whether feedback entered contact linked company. company_country Set filter feedback results based country set associated company. company_size Set filter feedback results based size company associated company. company_value Set filter feedback results based value company company assocaited feedback. customer Can either numeric ID, UUID contac contact email. product Filter results product associated feedback. Can either product UUID product ID. persona Filter results persona associated feedback. Can either persona UUID persona ID. job_role Filter results job role contact associated feedback. Use JobRole UUID. tags Filter feedback results tags associated feedback. Mulitple tags can specified acts . Use tag ID UUID. has_ideas Whether feedback associated one ideas. Default either. external_id Filter feedback return feedback associated specific External ID. example external ID ID record CRM ID ticket customer support application. external_url Filter feedback return feedback associated specific external url. example external url record CRM ticket customer support application group_by Setting customer group feedback customer page Set page results. Default 1. size setting number results per page. Default 100. ... arguments passed pp()

title: Get tibble of feedbacks. — pp_get_feedbacks
text: tibble

title: Get tibble of feedbacks. — pp_get_feedbacks
text: GET /feedbacks

title: Get an idea. — pp_get_idea

title: Get an idea. — pp_get_idea
text: id Numeric ID idea unless using by_project_id numeric project ID (Idea number seen UI). expand Whether return expanded version idea object. adds business case, user stories, comments, etc. by_project_id Whether ID represents project_id instead numeric ID. ... arguments passed pp()

title: Get an idea. — pp_get_idea
